channel.title: Trickster Neutral Social 1.1.1
channel.description:
Passive - Occupy and Redirect immune Day Ability(1) - Detain, prevent a player from using there day abilities, also voting cannot target king. You'll learn if they have any day abilities (2 uses) Day ability(2) - Vote swap, make someone's vote reverse (2 uses) Night ability(1) - False feedback, give someone a false message, you will learn what feedback they where going to get. (Infinite) Night ability(2) - Disguise, make some appear as a class for the night when Investigating, you will learn there true feedback. [Aka if a sheriff finds them as evil, you'll learn that they are evil even if you used a Bd player as a disguise] (Infinite) Goal: Defeat the Blue dragon.
Change Log
[details="Summary"] 1.1.1 -Added Class info
1.1 Changes -Detain, made into a limited use day ability also prevents the user from voting. -Removed the false Noble twin. -Added Disguise -False message renamed to false feedback, also Infinite uses
1.0 Version
[details="Summary"] Passive - Occupy and Redirect immune Day ability(1) - Fasle Vote, Make it look like a Noble/Aristro twin voted (2 uses) Day ability(2) - Vote swap, make someone’s vote reverse (2 uses) Night ability(1) - False message give someone a false message, you will learn what feedback they where going to get. (4 uses) Night ability(2) - Detain, prevent a player from using there day abilities for the next day, cannot target king, you’ll learn if they have none. (Infinite) Goal: Defeat the Blue dragon [/details] [/details]
Messages: Healed by physician/Alchemist Prevented Forced to target Death was delayed
Don't think there are any others correct me if I'm wrong.
If you get a prevented message it won't effect investigates they will still get results, if you get "forced" you will think you targeted that player.
Class info:
[details="Summary"] The Trickster is a "Social" Neutral Class.
The Trickster must see Blue Dragon lose, letting them side with the Unseen/Cult or Neutrals, making them a great ally for both alike.
The Trickster can Create false Information and mess around with the votes to cause chaos also preventing day actions, they can make players appear evil or to appear good, also can learn information in rare situations using false feedback or disguise to help find there allies or other information. [/details]

item.title: Trickster Neutral Social 1.1.1
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
Nah it’s a bit random, I just want more classes with sellswords wincon, I feel like scum helpers are good for the game I don’t know if there should be a limit to how much in game but I’d love to see one in game all the time.

Read full topic

What extra night ability would you have? Trying to think, I might remove noble twin and replace it with detain.

item.title: Trickster Neutral Social 1.1.1
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
Soulshade55r:

Messages:
Healed by physician/Alchemist
Prevented
Forced to target
Death was delayed

shouldn’t their be your target is NS and stuff like that… What about buff the ability to be this

Replace ALL of target feed back with this… That way you can add invest results if you can get good.

Read full topic

item.title: Trickster Neutral Social 1.1.1
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
Soulshade55r:

Day ability(1) - Fasle Vote, Make it look like a Noble/Aristro twin voted (2 uses)

Seems useless NGL, why would someone ever use this besides faking noble, as well it doesn’t help with they can confirm 100% as noble because they aren’t looking for NE they are looking for the apostle.

Soulshade55r:

Day ability(2) - Vote swap, make someone’s vote reverse (2 uses)

Seems useful however would be very careful about neutrals getting this power when their goal is to see BD lose, as well does this work on king?

Soulshade55r:

Night ability(1) - False message give someone a false message, you will learn what feedback they where going to get. (4 uses)

See no reason to not give this infinite uses, This class is already extremely weak on it’s own and it’s voting power is a hit or miss.

Soulshade55r:

Night ability(2) - Detain, prevent a player from using there day abilities for the next day, cannot target king, you’ll learn if they have none. (Infinite)

Honestly REALLY too weak to be a night ability.

Buff the class IMO.

Read full topic

item.title: Trickster Neutral Social 1.1.1
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
Thanks BTW I put it in the wrong area without realising

Read full topic

item.title: Trickster Neutral Social 1.1.1
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
Passive - Occupy and Redirect immune
Day Ability(1) - Detain, prevent a player from using there day abilities, also voting cannot target king. You’ll learn if they have any day abilities (2 uses)
Day ability(2) - Vote swap, make someone’s vote reverse (2 uses)
Night ability(1) - False feedback, give someone a false message, you will learn what feedback they where going to get. (Infinite)
Night ability(2) - Disguise, make some appear as a class for the night when Investigating, you will learn there true feedback. [Aka if a sheriff finds them as evil, you’ll learn that they are evil even if you used a Bd player as a disguise] (Infinite)
Goal: Defeat the Blue dragon.

Change Log

Summary

1.1.1
-Added Class info

1.1 Changes
-Detain, made into a limited use day ability also prevents the user from voting.
-Removed the false Noble twin.
-Added Disguise
-False message renamed to false feedback, also Infinite uses

1.0 Version

Summary

Passive - Occupy and Redirect immune
Day ability(1) - Fasle Vote, Make it look like a Noble/Aristro twin voted (2 uses)
Day ability(2) - Vote swap, make someone’s vote reverse (2 uses)
Night ability(1) - False message give someone a false message, you will learn what feedback they where going to get. (4 uses)
Night ability(2) - Detain, prevent a player from using there day abilities for the next day, cannot target king, you’ll learn if they have none. (Infinite)
Goal: Defeat the Blue dragon

Messages:
Healed by physician/Alchemist
Prevented
Forced to target
Death was delayed

Don’t think there are any others correct me if I’m wrong.

If you get a prevented message it won’t effect investigates they will still get results, if you get “forced” you will think you targeted that player.

Class info:

Summary

The Trickster is a “Social” Neutral Class.

The Trickster must see Blue Dragon lose, letting them side with the Unseen/Cult or Neutrals, making them a great ally for both alike.

The Trickster can Create false Information and mess around with the votes to cause chaos also preventing day actions, they can make players appear evil or to appear good, also can learn information in rare situations using false feedback or disguise to help find there allies or other information.
